actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize payment of costs incurred in the alteration or replacement of certain municipal waste incinerators for the purpose of controlling air pollution.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants, under the Clean Air Act, for costs incurred in the alteration or replacement of specified municipal waste incinerators owned and operated by local government entities for refuse burning in order to control air pollution.

titles.title: A bill to authorize payment of costs incurred in the alteration or replacement of certain municipal waste incinerators for the purpose of controlling air pollution.
